Package garrettsmith.blackjack.refimpl

Class Summary
TextPlayer Provides for playing Blackjack via the console.
 

Package garrettsmith.blackjack.refimpl Description

Provides for using the blackjack framework via the console and serves as an example implementation of EventHandler.

Use the scripts included with this package to execute the application. You can specify the -r option followed by the location of a properties file to specify the rules. Without the -r option the default rules are used.
